underlying_goal: Configure a Claude-Mem observer agent to monitor and record structured memory observations from an ongoing primary Claude Code session working on the Rohan project's izumo-dev CMS automation pipeline
friction_detail: Claude initially stated it couldn't proceed without tool execution messages, requiring the user to re-explain and provide more context in follow-up messages.
brief_summary: User directed a Claude-Mem observer agent to create structured memory observations from an ongoing Rohan CMS automation session involving STEP2 summary black-circle bug fixes, STEP8 PPV menu reflection, and STEP1 komi type classification changes; the agent successfully recorded observations throughout.
